mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event ( event_id, duration, img, start_date, content, title, gu_id, user_id, recruit) VALUES (event_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{duration}, #{img}, #{startDate}, #{content}, #{title}, #{guId}, #{userId}, #{recruit})
mapper.select: SELECT event_id eventId, duration, img, To_char(start_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') startDate, content, title, gu_id guId, user_id userId, recruit, applier_cnt applierCnt FROM event WHERE event_id = #{event_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET event_id = #{eventId}, title = #{title}, start_date = #{startDate}, duration = #{duration}, gu_id = #{guId}, content = #{content}, img = #{img}, recruit = #{recruit} WHERE event_id = #{eventId}
mapper.select: SELECT Count(event_id) FROM event WHERE event_id > 0

SELECT event_id eventId, duration, start_date startDate, content, title, regdate, gu_id guId, applier_cnt applierCnt FROM event
WHERE sysdate < start_date

SELECT page, eventId, title, userId, hit, writer, regdate, recruit, applierCnt FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM page, eventId, title, userId, hit, writer, To_char(regdate, 'yy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') regdate, recruit, applierCnt FROM ( SELECT e.event_id eventId, e.title title , e.user_id userId, e.hit hit , u.name writer, e.regdate, e.recruit, e.applier_cnt applierCnt FROM event e, users u WHERE e.event_id >0 AND e.user_id=u.user_id ORDER BY e.regdate DESC) ) WHERE page BETWEEN #{pageStart} AND #{pageStart} + #{perPageNum} - 1 ORDER BY page ASC
SELECT Count(event_id) FROM event e, users u WHERE event_id > 0 AND e.user_id = u.user_id
